title: Geocoding Data Report
description: Created a reporting website for product managers and other stakeholders. They wanted to stay up-to-date with the most important product production status in an easily consumable website.

parts.title: Homepage
parts.description: Listing the present status of the current quarter's products in production is valuable for many stakeholders who need a quick status update.

parts.title: All Products
parts.description: To organize all of the data we produce, an index of all products is used with filtering options to parse the large amount of data.

parts.title: Country Specifics
parts.description: Drilling down into each specific country, a stakeholder can have an in-depth overview of the products available.

parts.title: Planning
parts.description: Keeping our team organized with historical updates is necessary, so a planning page of products that need to be updated each quarter is used. This helps to accelerate, demystify and simplify our quarterly planning process.
